import 'swiper/swiper.scss' import 'swiper/components/navigation/navigation.scss' import 'swiper/components/pagination/pagination.scss' import 'swiper/components/scrollbar/scrollbar.scss' import SwiperCore, { Navigation, Pagination, Scrollbar, A11y } from 'swiper' import { useNotes } from '../states/notes' import { useState } from 'react' import { Note } from '../logic/colllections/note' import { BackButton } from './backButton' import { center } from '../styles/styles' import { NoteViewer } from './noteViewer' import { NotePreviewer } from './notePreviewer' SwiperCore.use([Navigation, Pagination, Scrollbar, A11y]) export const Reader = () => { useNotes() const [viewingNote, setViewingNote] = useState(null as Note) return (
{!viewingNote ? : null} {viewingNote ? : null}
) }
